thread.title: Liberal Groups Encourage Followers to Join Nationwide Strike on Feb. 17
thread.title_full: Liberal Groups Encourage Followers to Join Nationwide Strike on Feb. 17

author: V Saxena
title: Liberal Groups Encourage Followers to Join Nationwide Strike on Feb. 17
text:
Apparently, her liberal peers decided to act on her request and launch both a website and a Facebook event page promoting the strike, which has tentatively been scheduled for Feb. 17. 
As of Monday evening, 16,000 had signaled their intent to participate. 
Also featured on the page were five absurd demands, including “No Ban, No Wall,”“Healthcare For All,” No Pipelines,”“End the Global Gag Rule ” and “Disclose and Divest.”   
Take a look: 
According to the event’s official website, the plan was for participants to “not work” and “not purchase anything,” but instead post their support on social media and “(j)oin with other like-minded folks and occupy public space with positive messages of resistance and solidarity.” 
There was also a mention of community service, but only as a means to get out of working: “Participate in the National Day of Community Service … We hope this will allow folks who cannot ‘strike’ to take advantage of their employer’s commitment to Community Service and Community Service Leave request systems.”
